seriesJson.title: Ways of mankind II
seriesJson.description: This series is an exploration into the origin and development of cultures, customs and folkways in various parts of the world. The second series of Ways Of Mankind is concerned with a specific subject area and with two specific cultures.

node.title: Fighting cock refrain
node.description: This program, "The Fighting Cock Refrain," is the third in a series on the Balinese culture.

node.title: World renewal
node.description: This program, "World Renewal," is the fourth in a series on the Yurok Indian culture.

node.title: Sea-Monster and the bride
node.description: This program, "The Sea-Monster and the Bride," is the third of a series on the Yurok Indian culture and focuses on marriage customs.

node.title: Sea-Monster and the bride
node.description: This program, "The Sea-Monster and the Bride," is the third of a series on the Yurok Indian culture and focuses on marriage customs.

node.title: Reluctant shaman
node.description: This program, "The Reluctant Shaman," is the second of a series on the Yurok Indian culture.

node.title: Life of the Yurok
node.description: This program, "The Life of the Yurok," is the first of a series on the Yurok Indian culture.

node.title: Laying down the law
node.description: This program, "Laying Down the Law," summarizes this portion of the series, which focused on laws and justice in different communities of the world.

subject.name: Indians of North America--Legal status, laws, etc.

node.title: Forbidden name of Wednesday
node.description: This program, "The Forbidden Name of Wednesday," focuses on the Ashanti tribe and their concepts of law and justice.

node.title: Lion bites man
node.description: This program, "Lion Bites Man," focuses on the Ba-I-La tribe of Rhodesia (now Zimbabwe) and their concepts of law and justice.

node.title: The repentant horse thief
node.description: This program, "The Repentant Horse Thief," focuses on the Cheyenne people and their concepts of law and justice.

node.title: Case of the bamboo-sized pig
node.description: This program, "The Case of the Bamboo-sized Pig," focuses on the Ifugao people in the Philippines.

node.title: Case of the borrowed wife
node.description: This program, "The Case of the Borrowed Wife,"  focuses on law and justice in an Eskimo/Inuit community.
